flawed_nl_solution:
Mary needs 6*1= <<6*1=6>>6 folders.
Mary needs 6*3= <<6*3=18>>18 pencils.
Mary needs 18/6= <<18/6=3>>3 erasers.
Mary spends 6*6= $<<6*6=36>>36 on folders.
Mary spends 18*2= $<<18*2=36>>36 on pencils.
Mary spends 3*1= $<<3*1=3>>3 on erasers.
Mary spends 36+36+3= $<<36+36+3=72>>72 on all the supplies except the paints.
Mary spends 80-72= $<<80-72=8>>8 on the paint set.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 72. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
